attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Midlothian Council are rolling out a new programme called Modernising Midlothian. The promises of improving Midlothian sounds all very well, but underneath these promises there is a very sinister scheme called ‘Single Status’ this new status will see many council employees loosing hundreds of pounds from their salaries.  Many Midlothian Council employees are already on poor wages and many just meeting above the minimum wage. Ironically, the Council’s top earners (Chef Executives and so on) are to be excluded from the new ‘Single Status’scheme.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
